get.summary: Produces the summary view used for the appliance dashboard

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the appliance to provide an overview for.

get.summary: Produces the summary view used for the federation dashboard

platformType.description: product platform name of the appliance

recommendedSoftwareVersion.description: recommended software version to update to

localDiskBytes.description: total stored on local disk for the appliance in bytes

localUserBytes.description: user data stored on the appliance in bytes

localFreeBytes.description: available storage on the appliance in bytes

localCapacityBytes.description: total storage capacity of the appliance in bytes

cloudDiskBytes.description: total stored in the cloud for the appliance in bytes

cloudUserBytes.description: total user data stored in the cloud for the appliance in bytes

cloudFreeBytes.description: available cloud storage for the appliance in bytes

cloudCapacityBytes.description: total capacity of cloud storage for the appliance in bytes

catalystDataJobSessions.description: catalyst number of data job sessions

nasNumDedupeSessions.description: nas numbler of open dedupe sessions

catalystInboundCopyJobSessions.description: catalyst number of inbound copy job sessions

catalystOutboundCopyJobSessions.description: catalyst number of outbound copy job sessions

maxStreamsLimit.description: smm number of maximum streams limit

applianceStatus.description: enum simplified status of the appliance

applianceStatusString.description: localised simplified status of the appliance

dataServicesStatus.description: enum simplified status of the data services

dataServicesStatusString.description: localised simplified status of the data services

licenseStatus.description: enum simplified status of the licencing

licenseStatusString.description: localised simplified status of the licencing

userStorageStatus.description: enum simplified status of the user storage

userStorageStatusString.description: localised simplified status of the user storage

hardwareStatus.description: enum simplified status of the hardware

hardwareStatusString.description: localised simplified status of the hardware

remoteSupportStatus.description: enum simplified status of remote support

remoteSupportStatusString.description: localised simplified status of remote support

hamaStatus.description: enum simplified status of hama support

hamaStatusString.description: localised simplified status of hama support

catStoresSummary.description: summary of catalyst (non cloud bank) stores for the appliance

cloudBankStoresSummary.description: summary of catalyst cloud bank stores for the appliance

nasSharesSummary.description: summary of nas shares for the appliance

vtlLibrariesSummary.description: summary of vtl libraries for the appliance

nasRepMappingSummary.description: summary of nas replication mappings for the appliance

vtlRepMappingSummary.description: summary of vtl replication mappings for the appliance

userBytes.description: total user data stored (both locally and in cloud) for the appliance in bytes

diskBytes.description: total data stored (both locally and in cloud) for the appliance in bytes

dedupeRatio.description: overall dedupe ratio for the appliance

capacitySavedBytes.description: total saving in bytes through deduplication of user data for the appliance

capacitySavedPercent.description: percentage saving due to deduplication of user data for the appliance

numSynchronisingSystems.description: number of systems in the member list which have no data in the cache

softwareUpdateRecommended.description: a software update is recommended on at least one system in the federation

overallLocalDiskBytes.description: total stored on local disk for all reported appliances in bytes

overallLocalUserBytes.description: total user data stored on all reported appliances in bytes

overallLocalFreeBytes.description: total available storage on all reported appliances in bytes

overallLocalCapacityBytes.description: total storage capacity of all reported appliances in bytes

overallCloudDiskBytes.description: total stored in the cloud for all reported appliances in bytes

overallCloudUserBytes.description: total user data stored in the cloud for all reported appliances in bytes

overallCloudFreeBytes.description: total available cloud storage for all reported appliances in bytes

overallCloudCapacityBytes.description: total capacity in the cloud for all reported appliances in bytes

systemHealthSummary.description: summary of health statuses for all appliances

catStoresSummary.description: overall summary of catalyst (non cloud bank) stores for all reported appliances

cloudBankStoresSummary.description: overall summary of cloud bank stores for all reported appliances

nasSharesSummary.description: overall summary of nas shares for all reported appliances

vtlLibrariesSummary.description: overall summary of vtl libraries for all reported appliances

nasRepMappingSummary.description: overall summary of nas replication mappings for all reported appliances

vtlRepMappingSummary.description: overall summary of vtl replication mappings for all reported appliances

softwareVersions.description: summary of software versions for all reported appliances

platformTypes.description: summary of product platform names for all appliances

lowestSoftwareVersion.description: the lowest software version in the federation

highestSoftwareVersion.description: the highest software version in the federation

overallUserBytes.description: total user data stored (both locally and in cloud) for all reported appliances

overallDiskBytes.description: total data stored (both locally and in cloud) for all reported appliances

overallDedupeRatio.description: overall dedupe ratio for all reported appliances

overallCapacitySavedBytes.description: overall saving in bytes through deduplication of user data for all reported appliances

overallCapacitySavedPercent.description: overall percentage saving due to deduplication of user data for all reported appliances
